titles.title: Valley-Wide Noise Relief Act of 2023
Valley-Wide Noise Relief Act of 2023
To allow mandatory nighttime curfews at certain airports, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary:
Valley-Wide Noise Relief Act of 2023
This bill permits airports to implement partial or total mandatory nighttime curfews if they had a voluntary curfew in place before the passage of the Airport Noise and Capacity Act of 1990 and meet other requirements. (That act imposed stringent requirements on airports seeking to implement night curfews and other types of noise rules or restrictions.)
